name: svg2pdf.js
description: A javascript-only SVG to PDF conversion utility that runs in the browser leveraging jsPDF

scripts.exorcist:svg2pdf: browserify src/svg2pdf.js --debug -p licensify -s svg2pdf | exorcist dist/svg2pdf.js.map > dist/svg2pdf.js
scripts.uglify:dist: uglifyjs -m -c --source-map dist/svg2pdf.min.js.map --in-source-map dist/svg2pdf.js.map --source-map-url svg2pdf.min.js.map --comments /@license/ -o dist/svg2pdf.min.js dist/svg2pdf.js
scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run exorcist:svg2pdf && npm run uglify:dist
